code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec number_of_ways(s :: String.t(), t :: String.t(), k :: integer()) :: integer()
  def number_of_ways(s, t, k) do
    n = String.length(s)
    mod = 1_000_000_007

    if s == t do
      if rem(k, 2) == 0 do
        rem((n - 1) * pow(n, k - 1, mod), mod)
      else
        rem(n * pow(n - 1, k - 1, mod), mod)
      end
    else
      common_suffix_length = find_common_suffix_length(s, t)
      if common_suffix_length > 0 and rem(k, 2) == 1 do
        0
      else
        if rem(k, 2) == 0 do
          rem(pow(n, k - 1, mod), mod)
        else
          0
        end
      end
    end
  end

  defp find_common_suffix_length(s, t) do
    s |> String.graphemes |> Enum.reverse
    |> Enum.zip(String.graphemes(t) |> Enum.reverse)
    |> Enum.take_while(fn {a, b} -> a == b end)
    |> length()
  end

  defp pow(_, 0, _), do: 1
  defp pow(base, exp, mod) when exp > 0 do
    if rem(exp, 2) == 0 do
      rem(pow(rem(base * base, mod), div(exp, 2), mod), mod)
    else
      rem(base * pow(base, exp - 1, mod), mod)
    end
  end
end
